summary: After a young woman commits suicide, her neighbors try to piece together why she did it by tracking down her acquaintances.
cast: Eva Henning|Ulf Palme|Birgit Tengroth|Anders Ek|Gösta Cederlund|Karl-Arne Holmsten|Keve Hjelm|Marianne Löfgren|Björn Berglund|Anne-Marie Brunius|Gösta Gustafson|Sven-Eric Gamble|Sigbrit Molin|Gudrun Brost|Margit Andelius|Marit Bergson|Frithiof Bjärne|Astrid Bodin|Åke Falck|Gustaf Hiort af Ornäs|Svea Holst|Sten Sture Modéen|Norma Sjöholm|Georg Skarstedt|Alf Östlund
title: Flicka och hyacinter
